sentences.sentence: He probably thought I was just another big tosser on a Japanese bike. He may have been right.
sentences.translation: 他很有可能在想我只是一个坐在日本车上的大傻帽。

sentences.sentence: The shoe tosser, who was taken into police custody, according to the the Anatolia news agency, could become a symbol of resistance to that pressure.
sentences.translation: 掷鞋者已被警方拘留。据土耳其安纳托·利亚新闻通讯社(Anatolia news agency)报道，他可能成为抵抗这种压力的象征。
